subject: no child labor is used right today Edgar
body:
I was not born for courts and great affairs, but I pay my debts, believe and say my prayers.

If the young knew and the old could, there is nothing that couldn't be done.

Love is the cheapest of religions.

To make oneself an object, to make oneself passive, is a very different thing from being a passive object.

You can't think and hit the ball at the same time.

God is a concept by which we measure our pain.

Age, like distance lends a double charm.

Every time that I think of the crucifixion of Christ, I commit the sin of envy.

Those expressions are omitted which can not with propriety be read aloud in the family.

In the beginning was the Word. Man acts it out. He is the act, not the actor.

The more the world is specialized the more it will be run by generalists.

I pray Thee, O God, that I may be beautiful within.

Christian life consists of faith and charity.
